name: src/bind.js
src/castingrules.js
src/convert.js
Convert
description: Conversion between Objects, Elements, Attributes, and Strings

name: defaults
description: default settings for most methods in module

params.name: opts
params.description:
options {
         allowAllAttributes: boolean to allow all attributes to come through, default false
         typeConvert: boolean to allow conversion of numbers from strings
         ignore: Array of attributes to ignore default [class]

name: setAttrs
description: set attributes of an element sourced from an object

params.name: opts
params.description:
options {
         allowAllAttributes: boolean to allow all attributes to come through, default false
         typeConvert: boolean to allow conversion of numbers from strings
         ignore: Array of attributes to ignore default [class]

name: toAttrString
description: convert to string of attributes (myattr="value" anotherattr="value")

params.name: opts
params.description:
options {
         allowAllAttributes: boolean to allow all attributes to come through, default false
         typeConvert: boolean to allow conversion of numbers from strings
         ignore: Array of attributes to ignore default [class]

attributeSelector
description: generate attribute selector for query selection

name: map
description: map dom elements with desired attribute to object

src/observables/customelement.js
attach

name: src/observables/element.js

params.name: watchlist
params.description: list of attributes to watch on element (if null, watch them all)

name: src/observables/object.js

params.name: watchlist
params.description: list of attributes to watch on element (if null, watch them all)

name: autoWire
description: automatically detect all property keys and add listeners

params.name: donotdispatch
params.description: set key, but don't cause change event

attach

content:
{
  "name": "attrocity",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "dependencies": {},
  "devDependencies": {
    "@webcomponents/custom-elements": "^1.2.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "jsdom": "^11.11.0",
    "rollup": "^0.63.4",
    "tap": "^12.0.1",
    "tape": "^4.9.1",
    "wct-browser-legacy": "^1.0.1",
    "web-component-tester": "^6.8.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "npm run componenttest && npm run unittest",
    "componenttest": "./node_modules/.bin/wct --npm test/componenttest",
    "unittest": "./node_modules/.bin/tap test/unittests/tests/*.js unittests/tests/**/*.js",
    "build": "./node_modules/.bin/rollup src/main.js --file attrocity.js --format umd --name attrocity",
    "doc": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc -c esdoc.json"
  }
}
name: package.json
